Class CompanyRepController

java.lang.Object
controller.BaseController
controller.CompanyRepController
public class CompanyRepController extends BaseController
Controller for managing company representative operations related to internship postings and applications.

This controller handles the business logic for company representatives to:

  • Create, edit, and delete internship postings
  • Manage posting visibility
  • Review and process student applications
  • Monitor their active postings

Business Rules:

  • Each company representative can have a maximum of 5 active postings
  • Each internship posting can have a maximum of 10 slots
  • Company representatives can only manage their own company's postings
  • Approved or rejected postings cannot be edited
  • Only approved postings cannot be deleted
See Also:
  • CompanyRep
  • Internship
  • InternshipApplication
  • BaseController

  • Method Details

    • listInternships

      public List<Internship> listInternships(String repEmail)
      Retrieves all internship postings for a specific company representative.

      Returns all internships associated with the representative's company, regardless of their status (pending, approved, rejected, or filled).

      Parameters:
      repEmail - the email address of the company representative
      Returns:
      a list of all internships posted by the representative's company
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the company representative is not found

    • getInternship

      public Internship getInternship(String repEmail, String internshipId)
      Retrieves a specific internship posting owned by the company representative.

      Validates that the internship exists and that the representative's company owns the posting before returning it.

      Parameters:
      repEmail - the email address of the company representative
      internshipId - the unique identifier of the internship
      Returns:
      the internship with the specified ID
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the internship is not found
      SecurityException - if the internship belongs to a different company

    • createInternship

      public String createInternship(String repEmail, String title, String description, InternshipLevel level, String preferredMajor, LocalDate openDate, LocalDate closeDate, int maxSlots)
      Creates a new internship posting for the company representative.

      Workflow:

      1. Validates the company representative exists
      2. Validates all internship parameters
      3. Checks if the representative has reached the posting limit (5)
      4. Creates and saves the new internship posting with status PENDING

      Validation Rules:

      • Title must not be empty
      • Description must not be empty
      • Internship level is required
      • Preferred major must not be empty
      • Open and close dates are required
      • Close date must not be before open date
      • Max slots must be between 1 and 10
      Parameters:
      repEmail - the email address of the company representative
      title - the title of the internship position
      description - detailed description of the internship
      level - the level of the internship (FRESHMAN, SOPHOMORE, JUNIOR, SENIOR)
      preferredMajor - the preferred academic major for applicants
      openDate - the date when applications open
      closeDate - the date when applications close
      maxSlots - the maximum number of available positions
      Returns:
      the unique identifier of the newly created internship
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is invalid
      IllegalStateException - if the posting limit has been reached

    • editInternship

      public void editInternship(String repEmail, String internshipId, String title, String description, InternshipLevel level, String preferredMajor, LocalDate openDate, LocalDate closeDate, int maxSlots)
      Edits an existing internship posting.

      Workflow:

      1. Validates the company representative exists
      2. Validates the internship exists and is owned by the representative's company
      3. Checks if the internship can be edited (must be PENDING or REJECTED)
      4. Validates all new parameters
      5. Deletes the old internship and creates a new one with updated details

      Important: Editing replaces the internship entirely, generating a new ID. This is done to maintain data integrity and simplify the update process.

      Parameters:
      repEmail - the email address of the company representative
      internshipId - the unique identifier of the internship to edit
      title - the new title of the internship position
      description - the new detailed description
      level - the new internship level
      preferredMajor - the new preferred academic major
      openDate - the new application open date
      closeDate - the new application close date
      maxSlots - the new maximum number of positions
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the internship is not found or parameters are invalid
      SecurityException - if the internship belongs to a different company
      IllegalStateException - if the internship has been approved or rejected

    • deleteInternship

      public void deleteInternship(String repEmail, String internshipId)
      Deletes an internship posting.

      Workflow:

      1. Validates the company representative exists
      2. Validates the internship exists and is owned by the representative's company
      3. Checks if the internship can be deleted (must not be APPROVED)
      4. Removes the internship from the repository

      Deletion Rules:

      • PENDING internships can be deleted
      • REJECTED internships can be deleted
      • APPROVED internships cannot be deleted (to preserve application history)
      Parameters:
      repEmail - the email address of the company representative
      internshipId - the unique identifier of the internship to delete
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the internship is not found
      SecurityException - if the internship belongs to a different company
      IllegalStateException - if the internship has been approved

    • setVisibility

      public void setVisibility(String repEmail, String internshipId, boolean visible)
      Sets the visibility of an internship posting.

      Controls whether students can see and apply to the internship posting. Typically used to temporarily hide postings without deleting them, or to make approved postings visible to students.

      Parameters:
      repEmail - the email address of the company representative
      internshipId - the unique identifier of the internship
      visible - true to make the internship visible to students, false to hide it
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the internship is not found
      SecurityException - if the internship belongs to a different company

    • listApplications

      public List<InternshipApplication> listApplications(String repEmail, String internshipId)
      Retrieves all applications for a specific internship posting.

      Returns all applications submitted to the specified internship, allowing the company representative to review and process them.

      Parameters:
      repEmail - the email address of the company representative
      internshipId - the unique identifier of the internship
      Returns:
      a list of all applications for the internship
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the internship is not found
      SecurityException - if the internship belongs to a different company

    • markApplicationSuccessful

      public void markApplicationSuccessful(String repEmail, String applicationId)
      Marks an application as successful (accepted).

      Workflow:

      1. Validates the company representative and application exist
      2. Verifies the representative owns the internship
      3. Updates the application status to SUCCESSFUL
      4. Saves the updated application

      This indicates the student has been selected for the internship position.

      Parameters:
      repEmail - the email address of the company representative
      applicationId - the unique identifier of the application
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the application is not found
      SecurityException - if the internship belongs to a different company

    • markApplicationUnsuccessful

      public void markApplicationUnsuccessful(String repEmail, String applicationId)
      Marks an application as unsuccessful (rejected).

      Workflow:

      1. Validates the company representative and application exist
      2. Verifies the representative owns the internship
      3. Updates the application status to UNSUCCESSFUL
      4. Saves the updated application

      This indicates the student has not been selected for the internship position.

      Parameters:
      repEmail - the email address of the company representative
      applicationId - the unique identifier of the application
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the application is not found
      SecurityException - if the internship belongs to a different company
